Name: Breathspace
About the game: Breathspace is an action-roguelike in a sci-fi setting. A scientist lost in space finds himself on an endless space station with a bunch of evil soldiers and robots. Random weapons with unique effects will help you advance through the ship. Pump up the levels to make your way deeper and deeper into the endless space station. Features: weapon customization, character upgrade, room generation, increasing difficulty as you progress through the game, graphics from NetonticStudios.
